start-partup-intro-title: Hi %s, awesome you start a part-up!
start-partup-intro-paragraph: Part-up is all about teamwork, and you are the one to kick it off! Other uppers can join your part-up once you have shared your goals and first thoughts on the activities. Together you make it work.
start-partup-intro-explanation: Click the button 'Start a part-up' to get started.
start-partup-intro-start-explanation: Provide a name, goal and short description for you part-up. Determine where the part-up takes place and when it ends.
start-partup-intro-activities-explanatio: Add activities to your part-up and define what needs to be done to be succesful
start-partup-intro-promote-explanation: You are now ready to get your team together! Share your part-up with your network or social media.
